description: This file defines an interface (ILocalStore) for a local data storage component, providing abstract methods for operations such as opening a storage, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries and counts, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer type alias for this interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: Interface for a local storage system with methods for managing tables and entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local store with the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries for a specific table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range for a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Gets a list of entries from a table starting at a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds an entry to a specific table.
